She also gives paid courses in Armenian Language and Literature at their home, and she prepares pupils for college entrance examinations. Alisa’s husband also has a specialty of pedagogy; he works at the school as a teacher of mathematics. 

Alisa is asking for a loan of 400,000 Armenian drams in order to buy a computer, which both she and her husband greatly need during their courses at home. As she says, this purchase will help them to have more information and interesting materials for their pupils.

loans.use: to buy a computer, which both she and her husband greatly need during their courses at home.

loans.name: Musharaf

texts.ru: Мушараф родилась в 1976 года. Она замужем и на воспитании имеет 4 детей. Она трудолюбивая женщина и хранительница очага своего дома. Мушараф всегда старается найти источника дохода и обеспечить своих детей. Она более 8 лет занимается собственным бизнесом. Мушараф занимается купле продажей продуктов питания. Мушараф имеет торговую точку возле своего дома. Мушараф продает колбасные изделия, консервы, конфеты, макарон и т.п. Она запрашивает займ на сумму 10000 сомони для покупки продуктов питания для пополнения оборотного капитала. Она ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en: Musharaf was born in 1976.  She is married and raising 4 children.  She is a hardworking woman and a guardian of her home hearth.  Musharaf always tries to find a source of income and provide for her children.  She has been involved in her own business for over 8 years.  Musharaf is involved in buying and selling food products.  She has a retail outlet near her house.  Musharaf sells sausage, canned goods, candy, pasta, etc.  She is requesting a loan in the amount of 10,000 somoni to buy food products to refill her working capital.  She awaits your kindness.

loans.use: to buy food products to refill her working capital

loans.name: Saniya Group

texts.fr:
Le groupe   SANIYA est constitué de 5 femmes toutes mariées ayant une moyenne d’âge de 23 ans et 3 enfants. Elles vivent  dans des  familles traditionnelles élargies  dans le quartier  HEREMAKONO NORD de la ville de Bougouni. 
Elles se sont connues à travers des liens de voisinage, d’amitié et de commerce. Pour renforcer leur capacité financière afin de mieux faire leur commerce, elles ont adhéré à l’institution de microfinance Soro Yiriwaso avec laquelle elles sont à leur 2 eme prêt. Le précédent prêt à été correctement remboursé. Ce groupe de femmes fait le commerce de  jus à l’image de MARIAM qui est la femme assise   dans la photo. Elle compte acheter avec son  prêt, 100Kg de sucre, des essences, et des sachets de jus avec les grossistes de Bougouni. Elle effectue ses ventes au marché  et à domicile, en détail au comptant et à crédit  à une clientèle composée de femmes et d’hommes. 
Elle  envisage réaliser un bénéfice mensuel moyen de 40.000FCFA qui sera  investi dans les activités et rembourser le prêt.
texts.en:
The group Saniya consists of 5 women who are all married and on average 23 years old with 3 children. They live in traditional extended families in the Heremakono North neighborhood in the city of Bougouni.

They met through neighborhood, friendship and business ties. To strengthen their financial capacity in order to better do business, they joined the microfinance institution Soro Yiriwaso, with which they are on their 2nd loan. The previous loan was correctly repaid.

This group of women sells juice, just like Mariam who is the woman who is sitting in the photo. With her loan she plans to buy 100 kg of sugar, essential oils, and packages of juice from the wholesalers in Bougouni. She sells at the market and from home, retail for cash and credit to a clientele which consists of women and men.

She envisions making an average monthly profit of 40,000 FCFA which will be reinvested in the businesses and used to repay the loan.

loans.use: to buy ingredients to make juice.

loans.name: Hakema

texts.en: Hakema was born in 1973. She is married and a mother of six. Her husband is currently working as a smith man. Hakema has been selling home products for one year. She started her business at home, selling a small quantity of products. Now she is planning to buy a larger quantity of home products to increase her profits and income and to be a good source of financial support for her husband in covering their children's needs. But she doesn't have enough money to do so. For this reason, she applied for this loan.

loans.use: to buy a larger quantity of home products to sell.

loans.name: Ayat

texts.en:
Ayat is 21 years old. She lives in a sector in Jordan called Mafraq with her family, which consists of 4 siblings and her parents. Her brother is in the military and her mother works as a cleaner at a school. Ayat is in her 4th year of studying for a Bachelor of School Guidance degree. 

She is planning to get her degree in order to work in her field of study after graduation in order to start helping her parents financially, as her parents are currently facing a financial crisis which is not helping them pay her upcoming semester fees. For this reason, she applied for this loan.

loans.use: To pay her upcoming semester fees.

loans.name: Martha

texts.en: Marhta is a 40-year-old lady who lives in Buchanan with her husband and three children aged between 10 and 22 that are in school. Since 2009 she been involved in selling used clothes in the local market; she was helped by her husband to start her business. She is requesting a loan to purchase more used clothes for her business, She hopes to build a new home for her children in the future.

loans.use: to purchase more used clothes for her business

loans.name: Esther

texts.en: Esther is 30 years old and lives in Buchanan. She is married and has three children between ages of  8 and 15, who are attending school and live at home. For three years now she has been selling peppers, salt, rice, charcoal, etc. She started this business with money given to her by her husband who is a principle. She is requesting a loan to buy more peppers, salt, rice, charcoal, etc. for her business. She hopes to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy more peppers, salt, rice, charcoal, etc. for her business.

loans.name: Fatu W.

texts.en:
Fatu is 48 years old and lives in Buchanan. She’s married with five children between the ages of 17 and 30. Her husband is a businessman, and she has been involved in business for the past 12 years. She received help from her  husband to improve her business, and presently she is selling oil, rice, sugar and dried peppers. She enjoys the flow of her customers.

Fatu is requesting a loan to purchase more oil, rice, sugar and dried peppers for her business. Her plan is to educate her children.

loans.use: to purchase more oil, rice, sugar and dried peppers for her business,

loans.name: Maria Susana

texts.es: María, tiene  30 años de edad, es madre soltera y tiene un hijo con quien ella reside en el municipio de San Pedro Sula. Lleva 3 años de tener la venta de ropa como ser pantalones, blusas, camisas, bóxer, faldas, short etc. El negocio lo tiene establecido en un mercado local. Ha solicitado un  préstamo por 9,000 Lempiras, para invertir en la compra de más mercadería para el negocio como pantalones y camisas y poder aumentar  las ventas y obtener mejores ganancias. su meta es hacer una casa, darle un mejor futuro a su hijo y ampliar el negocio.
texts.en:
Maria is a 30 years old single mother with a son with whom she lives in the municipality of San Pedro Sula. For 3 years now she has had a business selling clothing such as pants, blouses, shirts, boxer shorts, skirts, shorts, etc. Her business is established in a local market.

Maria is soliciting a loan of 9,000 Lempiras to invest in purchasing more merchandise for her business, especially pants and shirts. She hopes to augment her sales and obtain better income. Maria's goal is to construct a house and offer a better future to her son, plus expand the business.

loans.use: buy pants and shirts to sell.

loans.name: Asia

texts.en: Asia is a 33-year-old married woman who has been running a small general store in her community for many years. She offers a variety of grocery items at a reasonable price and has retained many customers who regularly shop at her store. She makes enough to provide for her family. To make her store fully stocked, she requested a loan of 30,000 PKR, which she will use to buy rice, sugar and flour from the market at lower rates. In this way, she would be able to meet increasing demand consistently. She is in her fourth loan cycle with good credit history. Asia wishes to utilize part of her revenue to increase her business capital.

loans.use: to buy rice, sugar and flour.

loans.name: Ararat

texts.en:
Ararat was born in the city of Vedy, in the Ararat region, where he now resides. He is 35-years-old. He is married and has a three-year-old daughter. His wife is unemployed. After returning from the army, Ararat worked as a builder, then as a taxi driver. Since 2010, he has been working at a shop that produces windows and doors. For two years, he has been a senior specialist, but since being very resourceful and diligent person, Ararat has become the chief of this workshop.

Ararat asks a loan of 550,000 Armenian drams (AMD) in order to buy a car for his own use, which will help him to commute to work on time.

loans.use: to buy a car for his own use, which will help him to commute to work on time.

loans.name: Juan

texts.en:
Juan is married with 4 children. Juan is 27 years old and lives in Eastern Pob., Lopez Jaena, Philippines.

Juan is a farmer and grows rice to earn a living. He has been doing this for 2 years. He has requested a loan to purchase farm inputs such as fertilizers and pesticides.

Juan has been a member of PMPC for 3 years. In the future, Juan hopes to have enough savings for his family's future.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizers and pesticides.

location.town: Plaridel-Eastern Pob., Lopez Jaena, Misamis Occide

loans.name: Eddie

texts.en:
Eddie is married with 2 children. Eddie is 42 years old and lives in Puntod, Lopez Jaena, Philippines.

Eddie is a farmer and grows rice to earn a living. He has been doing this for 20 years. He has requested a loan to purchase farm inputs such as fertilizers and pesticides.

Eddie has been a member of PMPC for 2 years. In the future, Eddie hopes to acquire another rice farm.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizers and pesticides.

loans.name: Patience

texts.en: Patience is 25 years old and lives in Buchanan. She is unmarried with three children between the ages of 2 and 6 that live at home. Only two of her children attend school. She has been selling rice, oil, vita, onion, salt, etc. in the local market. She started this business with money given to her by her aunt. She enjoys the money she earns from her business every day. She is requesting a loan to purchase more rice, oil, vita, onion, salt, etc. for her business. She hopes to keep improving her business, educating her children, and to build a house.

loans.use: to purchase more rice, oil, vita, onion, salt, etc. for her business.

loans.name: Mary

texts.en:
Mary is 48 years old and lives in Buchanan. She is a high school graduate and has six children between 17 to 31 years old, but only one lives at home and attends school. For the past twenty-one years she has been selling charcoal, red oil, and 'fufu' (dough made of cassava) in the local market. She is requesting a loan to purchase more charcoal, red oil, and 'fufu' for her business.

She wishes to build her own house and educate all her children.

loans.use: to purchase more charcoal, red oil, and 'fufu' for her business.

loans.name: Theresa

texts.en:
Theresa is 38 years old and lives in Buchanan. She is married and has five children between the ages of  3 and 24; they are attending school and living at home, and her husband is a businessman. For the past five years she has been in the fish business. She enjoys the selling, because she makes a lot of profit.

She is requesting a loan to purchase more fish to resell. She hopes to build a house for her children and expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more fish to resell.

loans.name: Ruth

texts.en: Ruth is 45 years old and lives in Buchanan. She is married and has eight children between  ages 8 and 29, but only five of them attend school and live at home. For the past five years she has been operating a small table where she sells dried and fresh fish in the local market. Sometimes she has few customers, but most of the time she makes lots of profit. She is requesting a loan to purchase more dried and fresh fish to expand her business. In the future she hopes to expand her business into a big store.

loans.use: to purchase more dried and fresh fish to expand her business.

loans.name: Laston

texts.en:
Laston is 45 years old and owns a Zoona mobile money transfer business in Lusaka city center with his wife.  They live in a rented house with their four children and two of his wife’s sisters. 

Laston likes to describe his business as the service of sending and receiving money from one location to another in Zambia.  He started operating the business as a way to provide for his family and empower his wife.  Laston enjoys the business because it is an opportunity for him to serve his community.  He enjoys interacting with all the customers from different walks of life that do business at his outlet.  

The reason for Laston’s loan request is his big challenge of having very little working capital to service his customer base.   When customers want to send large amounts of money, he cannot serve them.  It also makes operations difficult because he is always running back and forth to the bank to maintain enough cash to serve customers.  This Kiva loan will enable Laston to more than double his working capital float and in turn, serve more customers.  This will bring his business additional profit as well.  

Laston’s dream is to take care of his family and educate his children.  He would like his kids to have the education that he never had the opportunity to receive.  Laston believes if he can grow his business this dream will become reality.

loans.use: To increase his working capital and allow him to serve customers sending and receiving larger amounts of money at his shop

loans.name: Rachel

texts.en:
Rachel is from Helen Village, Larena, Siquijor.  She is 33 years old and single.

This year, Rachel applied for her membership with PMPC.  Hearing all the benefits, she never hesitated to become a member. Recently, Rachel is asking a financial assistance of Php 40,000 to buy additional hot dogs, tocino and longganisa (sausage). In this way, she hopes to increase her income and be of help in the expansion of her business. She has found assistance for her financial needs through Paglaum Multi Purpose Cooperative and she is thankful with all her heart.

loans.use: To buy additional hot dogs, tocino and longganisa (sausage)

loans.name: Anita

texts.en:
Anita is married with three children. Anita is 58 years old and lives in Lower Puntod, Lopez Jaena, Misamis Occidental.

Anita has a mini grocery store to earn a living and has had this business for three years. Each month, she earns PHP 1,500 doing this type of work. She has requested a loan of 10,000 PHP to purchase  additional inventory for her mini grocery store.

Anita has been a member of PMPC for 10 years.  In the future, Anita hopes to be successful in her business.

loans.use: to pay for additional inventory for her mini grocery store.

location.town: Plaridel-Lower Puntod, Lopez Jaena Misamis Occiden

loans.name: Nora

texts.en:
Nora is 35 years old and lives in Katipunan, Plaridel, Misamis Occidental. She is married with 3 children. 

Nora has a hog raising business and earns approximately PHP 5,000.00 each month doing this type of work. She has  requested a loan to purchase feed and vitamins.

Nora has been a member of PMPC for 9 years. In the future, Nora would like to be successful in her business.

loans.use: to purchase pig feed and vitamins.

loans.name: Cherlita

texts.en:
Cherlita is 29 years old and a resident of Lower Salug Daku, Mahayag Zamboanga del Sur, Philippines. She is married with 2 kids. Starting with 5,000 PHP in capital, she opened a sari-sari (general store) and was able to expand it with the help of Paglaum Cooperative. Aside from the financial assistance, she was able to generate savings and enjoy the benefits given by the co-op. She became a member in 2011 and has taken out five loans. 

Now, she is applying for 12,000 PHP to buy additional stocks for her sari-sari store, particularly basic commodities. In the future, she wants to own a mini-mart, and she will be fully satisfied if she sees her children finish their studies.

loans.use: To buy additional stocks for her sari-sari Store.

loans.name: Sugran

texts.en: Sugran is a 52-year-old married woman and mother of five children. She has been running a business of hand embroidery for ten years. She makes beautiful patterns for the people of her community. Her designs are much in demand and she has managed to gather a clientele that allows her to contribute to the expenses of her home. To help her to continue her operations, she has requested a loan of 30,000 PKR to buy spools of thread in different colors, and packs of beads, sequins and stones for embellishment. In this way, she would be able to cater to more customers consistently. She is hopeful to get increase in her income by targeting more customers. She wishes to spend part of the profits on providing a better standard of living to her family members.

loans.use: to buy spools of thread in different colors, and packs of beads, sequins and stones.

loans.name: Gulshan

texts.en: Gulshan is a 31-year-old married woman and a mother of two children. She is striving hard to meet her family's needs, including food, clothing, and health. Her husband is employed at a small restaurant and his income is not sufficient to meet the daily expenditures of the family. Gulshan started her business of sewing clothes to contribute to the family's income. She is very familiar with stitching techniques. She started her business with the support of the Kashf Foundation, and used her first loan to buy a sewing machine. At present, she enjoys a great client list and has gained a lot of appreciation and popularity in her community. Currently, she is requesting a loan of 20,000 PKR to buy spools of thread along with packs of buttons and laces in various colors. This will help her to meet the demands of her customers without fail. She hopes to grow her business, and dreams of giving a good and quality education to her children through all her hard work in her business.

loans.use: to buy spools of thread along with packs of buttons and laces in various colors.

loans.name: Antonia

texts.en: Antonia is 62 years old. She is married and has two children. She lives in Birayan, Rizal, Zamboanga del Norte. Antonia is engaged in hog fattening. She has been in this business for three years and earns a monthly income of 3000 PHP. Antonia requested a new loan to buy feed and materials for pigpens. She has been a CUMI member of Paglaum MPC for 4 years. Antonia believes that she will be able to put aside more savings out of this business.

loans.use: to buy feed and build pigpens

loans.name: Erlinda

texts.en:
Erlinda earns a living through furniture made to order.  She is 52 years old, married, and lives in Dapaon, Sindangan, Zamboanga Del Norte, Philippines. She is now well known for the nice quality of services she offers. Her service is self-sustainable and has become profitable, with a net profit of about Php 8000 per month.  

Erlinda is seeking a Php 3000 loan. She would like to use the loan to purchase materials for the furniture. This is a microfinance loan, and would be repaid in few  months. In her five previous loans she has never had a delinquency. Erlinda is very diligent and loves accuracy which only adds to effective management of her venture.

loans.use: to buy materials for furniture making

location.town: Sindangan - Dapaon, Sindangan, Zamboanga del Norte

loans.name: Roca Fuerte Group

texts.en:
The Roca Fuerte Trust Bank is located in the western highlands of Guatemala, in the town of Los Altos, in the department of Quetzaltenango. Just last March, a group of women decided to organize themselves into a Friendship Bridge Trust Bank (which they named, Roca Fuerte Trust Bank) and they requested their first loan cycle from Friendship Bridge. Happily, the women were able to successfully pay back the entire loan. 

The group is currently composed of 15 members, including six new members. The women are motivated to move forward and they have requested another loan cycle. They are engaged in various commercial activities, such as selling shoes, produce (vegetables, fruit, and tortillas), clothing, and snacks. Another client owns a sawmill. There is even a client who sells products by catalogue! Their ultimate goal is to support their families, send their children to school, and develop their community.

The Secretary of the Trust Bank is 25-year-old Gabriela, who is the mother of two children. Gabriela and her husband own the sawmill, which they started about four years ago. With a great deal of time and effort, they were able to grow their business and they have been quite innovative. They have introduced new products to their customers, which have been helpful in expanding their business. Gabriela is eager to receive her second loan with Friendship Bridge, which she will use to purchase additional wood to make more products for the customers. There are four additional employees in their business!

Gabriela, along with all members of the Roca Fuerte Trust Bank, are happy to belong to the Friendship Bridge program and express their great appreciation to Kiva investors. The women meet once a month to make payments and receive training on topics, such as children's rights (with an emphasis on education), women's health, hygiene, nutrition, business administration, savings and indebtedness. These trainings benefit not only the members, but also their families and the community. They look forward to a brighter future as empowered women, eliminating poverty!

loans.use: to purchase additional wood to make furniture.

loans.name: Las Golondrinas Group

texts.en:
Santa Lucia La Reforma is a town in the Department ot Totonicapan in Southwest Guatemala. The Friendship Bridge Trust Bank “Las Golondrinas” or “The Swallows” is located here and is composed of six women who are mostly in their twenties except for one who is 60 years of age. The group is starting its third loan cycle with Friendship Bridge. These loans will be most useful in providing working capital for the various businesses of these women including textile production and animal husbandry.

The President of “Las Golondrinas” is 25-year-old Ana who has a dynamic personality and a tremendous drive to move forward. She is married with an 8-month-old baby boy. Ana makes handmade traditional textiles, especially the beautiful sashes called “fajas” used by the indigenous women of Guatemala to keep their tubular skirts in place. She also raises animals including chickens, pigs and rabbits. Ana travels by public transport to three different markets outside her community each week to sell her products. She is happy to begin her 3rd loan cycle with Friendship Bridge as it allows her to increase her inventory and increase her income. She will buy raw materials such as yarn and thread as well as some animals and feed for them.

Ana relates that she really enjoys belonging to the Trust Bank and being with many of the women of her community on a monthly basis. During their meetings, which last for about one hour, the women receive training about various topics such as health, nutrition, self-esteem and women’s rights. Ana states that the topic that impacts her the most is business management. In her own words, “I like to go the meetings because I have fun with my colleagues and we share and learn a lot together.”

The six women of the “Las Golondrinas” Trust Bank thank KIVA investors for their generosity and confidence in funding their loan. With these funds, the ladies can sustain and grow their businesses, generate an income and support their families. They are especially pleased that they can provide for their children’s educational needs. Armed with their new tools, everyone looks forward to a brighter future for themselves, their families and their town, Santa Lucia La Reforma.

loans.use: To purchase raw materials such as yarn and thread, and to buy animals

loans.name: Heleniemar

texts.en:
Hardworking mother best describes Heleniemar, 28 years old, residing in Lawis, Municipality of Sindangan, Zamboanga Del Norte, Philippines. Heleniemar has four children and is married to a carpenter. The wage that her husband gets isn’t enough to cover their daily needs in their family. So, Heleniemar started a business, a food stand. Heleniemar has been in the business more than nine years now. 

Heleniemar  wants to expand her food stand. She wants to earn more profit and to have enough to sustain her family, especially for her children, and she would be able to send her son to college. In order for her  to make her wish possible, she needs PHP 5,000 in additional capital and will use the money to expand her business.  She intends to buy meat, rice toppings and all the ingredients, utensils and other things that are needed in the food stand. She hopes to live a comfortable life someday with her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional kilos of meat, rice, and utensils for her business

loans.name: Oretha

texts.en: Oretha is 35 years old and lives in Buchanan. She is married and has three children between 3 and 17 years old. For the past 10 years she has been running  a cook shop (restaurant) in the market. She is requesting a loan to purchase more rice, fish, vita, fufu (an African food made of cassava), etc. for her business, and she hopes to build a house in the near future.

loans.use: to purchase more rice, fish, vita, fufu (an African food made of cassava), etc. for her business

loans.name: Gladys

texts.en: Gladys is 38 years old. She is married and has 1 child. She lives in D'ban Calamba Misamis Occidental. Gladys has been engaged in the rice retail business for 5 years and earns a monthly income of 18,000 PHP. Gladys requested a new loan for additional capital to buy rice and corn for additional customers. Gladys has been a CUMI member of Paglaum MPC since 2007. She believes that being a businesswoman is good.

loans.use: to purchase 20 sacks of various rice and feeds

loans.name: Roberta

texts.en:
Roberta is married with 3 children. Roberta is 47 years old and lives in the Philippines.

Roberta is a farmer and grows rice to earn a living. She has been doing this for 20 years.Sshe has requested a loan to buy fertilizer.

Roberta has been a member of PMPC for 7 years. In the future Roberta hopes to have a truck to deliver her rice.

loans.use: to support her rice mill

location.town: Pagadian-Upper Bayao Tukuran Zamboanga del Sur

loans.name: Nora

texts.en:
Nora is 38 years old and lives in Buchanan. She is married and has seven children, ages 11 to 22. All of them are in school and live at home. 

For the past eight years, Nora has been selling charcoal in the local market, from a shop.

She is requesting a loan to purchase more charcoal for her business. She plans to buy a piece of land and build her house.

loans.use: to purchase more charcoal for her business.

loans.name: Marie

texts.en:
Marie is 38 years old; she lives and works in Buchanan, the capital city of Grand Bassa County. She is married, and she stopped her education at grade 4, and has five children between 14 and 20 years old, all of whom are living at home.  For the past six years she been selling peppers, Vita, salt, onions, flour, etc, in the local market. 

Marie started this business with a small amount of money from her mother, and she learned this business from her friends. She likes her business because of the way people buy from her. She is requesting a loan to purchase more peppers, Vita, salt, onions, flour, etc. for her business. Her dream is to build a decent house and live a good life.

loans.use: to purchase more peppers, Vita, salt, onions, flour, etc. for her business

loans.name: Barno

texts.ru: Барно родилась в 1961 года. Она замужем и на воспитании имеет 2 детей. Она добропорядочная и довольно спокойная женщина. Барно более 16 лет работает в садике. Она очень любит детей и справляется с работой отлично. Барно хочет отремонтировать свою квартиру. Барно получает маленькую зарплату, и ее зарплата не хватает для того, чтобы сделать сбережения и проводить ремонт квартиры. Она запрашивает займ на сумму 500 долларов США для покупки краски, обои и т.п. Она ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en:
Barno was born in 1961, is married, and has two children. She is a calm and respectable woman. Barno has been working at a kindergarten for over 16 years; she loves children and is very good at her job. 

Barno would like to renovate her apartment. Her income is modest and does not allow her to save up enough money to cover the repairs. She is applying for a loan of $500 to buy paint, wallpaper, and other items. She appreciates your kindness.

loans.use: To renovate her apartment

loans.name: Martha

texts.en: Martha is 43 years old and lives in Buchanan. She is married with two children ages 8 and 17 who live at home and attend school. She has been selling garlic in the local market, and she started this business with money given to her by her husband. She enjoys the flow of her customers every day. She is requesting a loan to purchase more garlic for her business. She hopes to improve her children's education and build a house.

loans.use: to purchase more garlic for her business

loans.name: Phlicia

texts.en:
Phlicia lives in Buchanan. She is 48 years old. She did not go to school and she is married, with seven children between the ages of 18 and 28. Only three are in school and live at home.

For five years, Phlicia has been selling rice, pepper, and  palm oil in the local market. She started this business with money given to her by her mother and she learned the business from her. 

Phlicia is requesting a loan to purchase more rice, pepper, and palm oil for her business. Her plan is to build a house for her children.

loans.use: to purchase more rice, pepper, and palm oil for her business.

loans.name: Juliane

texts.en:
Juliane is 47 years old, married, and a resident of Balamban, Mahayag, Zamboanga del Sur. She earns a living through farming.

She has been a member of PMPC for 3 years and enjoys the privileges of being a member of the Cooperative. Now, she is applying a loan of Php 15,000.00 to buy fertilizers and farm inputs.

Juliane deeply wishes to remain a member in good standing with PMPC.

loans.use: To buy fertilizers and farm inputs.

loans.name: Analiza

texts.en:
Analiza is 42 years old and lives in Libertad Bajo,Sinacaban,Philippines. She is married with 3 children. 

Analiza works in the fish industry and catches fish for a living. She has been doing this for 5 years. She has requested a loan to acquire additional fishing materials and accessories, such as fishing tackle, lures, reels, rods, poles, gear, etc.

Analiza has been a member of PMPC for 8 years. In the future, Analiza hopes to financially support her immediate family members.

loans.use: to acquire additional fishing materials and accessories, such as fishing tackle, lures, reels, rods, poles, gear, etc.

loans.name: Florabel

texts.en:
Florabel is married, without children. She is 43 years old and lives in Libertad Bajo, Sinacaban, Philippines.

To earn a living, Florabel sells dried fish and longganisa and she has had this business for three years. 

She has requested a loan to buy additional dried fish and longganisa to sell.

Florabel has been a member of Paglaum Multi-Purpose Cooperative (PMPC) for two years. In the future, Florabel hopes to financially support her immediate family members.

loans.use: to buy additional dried fish and longganisa to sell.

loans.name: Kholboy

texts.ru: Холбой пожилой человек в возрасте 65 лет. Он скотовод и занимается выращиванием крупного рогатого скота. Холбой женат, имеет троих детей и проживает всей семьей в районе А.Джоми. Он занимается животноводством более 20 лет. Все эти годы он обеспечивал свою семью за счет этой деятельности и благодарен отцу, что он научил его этому ремеслу. В скотном дворе Холбоя сейчас имеется две коровы. Он хочет увеличить поголовье скота и с такой целью обратился за кредитом. На запрашиваемую сумму он собирается купить трех коров. Холбой обычно откармливает скот в течение двух месяцев и затем выводит на продажу. Он будет благодарен всем за поддержку.
texts.en:
Kholboy is an elderly man of 65 years. He is married, has three children, and lives with his family in A. Jomi. He has been a cattle breeder for over 20 years, and raises large-horned cattle. Throughout these 20 years, the business has allowed him to provide for his family and he is grateful to his father, who first taught him the trade. 

There are currently two cows in Kholboy's barnyard. He would like to increase the number of cattle he owns; this is his goal in applying for a loan. He plans to use the requested amount to buy three cows. Kholboy usually feeds his cattle for two months and then sells them. He appreciates your assistance.

loans.use: to buy three cows in order to expand his business

loans.name: Tonia

texts.en:
Tonia is 29 years old and lives in Buchanan. Her husband works as a driver. They have three children between the ages of 3 to 14.  All three children are in school and live at home. 

For the past two years, Tonia has been selling rubber dishes (bowls, plates, spoons, buckets, etc.) in the local market. She sells from Monday to Saturday, spending ten hours on her business each day. Tonia is requesting a loan to purchase more rubber dishes for her business. Her plan is to build a house.

loans.use: to purchase more rubber dishes such as bowls, plates, spoons, buckets, etc. for her business.

loans.name: Martha

texts.en:
Martha lives in Buchanan. She is 37 years old. She is married and has five children between the ages of 8 and 21. Her children are in school and live at home. 

For the past 11 years, Martha has been selling used shoes in the local market. She established this business with a small loan from a friend. 

Martha is requesting a loan to purchase more used shoes to expand her business. In the future, Martha wants to build a house.

loans.use: to purchase more used shoes to expand her business.

loans.name: Tomah

texts.en:
Tomah is 35 years old. She lives in Buchanan. She is married and has four children between the ages of 3 and 18. Tomah stopped her education at fifth grade.

Tomah has been running a table selling fish at the local market. She started this business with money given to her by her husband. She enjoys the money she receives from her business every day. 

Tomah is requesting a loan to purchase more fish for her business. She wants to have her own house in the near future.

loans.use: to purchase more fish for her business.

loans.name: Musu

texts.en: Musu is 43 years old and lives in Buchanan. She is unmarried and has five children between the ages of 6 and 21. Among her children only four are attending school and live at home. she has been running a table selling red oil in the local market. She started this business with money given to her by her mother, and she enjoyS the profit she makes from her business every  day. She is requesting a loan to purchase more red oil for her business, She wants to be an owner of houses in the future.

loans.use: to purchase more red oil for her business

loans.name: Esther

texts.en: Esther lives in Buchanan. She is 47 years old, and she did not go to school but is married with five children between the ages of 15 and  20 that are in school and live at home. For 15 years she has been selling rice, peppers, bitter ball (squash), okra, and palm oil in the local market. She started  this  business  with money given to her by her mother. She is requesting a loan to purchase more rice, peppers, bitter ball (squash), okra, and palm oil for her business. Her plans are to buy a piece of land and build a house for her children.

loans.use: to purchase more rice, peppers, bitter ball (squash), okra, and palm oil for her business

loans.name: Francis Waldina

texts.es: Francis. Tiene 19 años de edad, tiene un hijo, vive en unión libre con su esposo y reside en el municipio de Macuelizo, Santa Bárbara. Hace 1 año que se dedica a la venta de mercadería (ropa, zapatos, short, jeans, blusas, ropa interior, ropa de niño, carteras etc.). El préstamo que ha solicitado es por 12,000 Lempiras y lo va invertir en la compra de más mercadería para la venta  como blusas, pantalones, trajes para niños zapatos etc. y así poder obtener más ganancias en su negocio. Su meta es poder seguir creciendo como comerciante, poder ayudar a su esposo con los gastos del hogar y ahorrar para la educación de su hijo.
texts.en: Francis,19, has a son and lives in a free union with her husband in the city of Macuelizo in Santa Bárbara. She started selling merchandise (clothing, shoes, shorts, jeans, blouses, underwear, children's clothing, wallets, etc.) a year ago. She has applied for a loan of 12,000 lempiras to buy more merchandise to sell like blouses, pants, and children's suits and earn more income. Her goals are to keep expanding her business, to help her husband pay household expenses, and to save for her son's education.

loans.use: to buy clothing like blouses, pants, and children's suits and shoes to stock and sell.

loans.name: Svetlana

texts.ru:
Светлана – из Мелитополя. Она замужем и у нее есть взрослая дочь. Она работает на одном из местных рынков своего родного города, торгуя женской одеждой. У Светланы свое торговое место, опыт работы уже 14 лет. 
Светлане необходима сумма в 15 000 гривен для того, чтобы закупить сезонную женскую одежду, а именно куртки, пиджаки и пальто под реализацию осенью.
texts.en: Svetlana is from Melitopol.  She is married and has a grown daughter.  Svetlana works at one of the local markets in her native town and sells women's clothing.  Svetlana owns her retail space and has 14 years of work experience.  Svetlana needs a loan in the amount of 15 000 hryvnia to purchase women's seasonal clothing, specifically jackets, blazers and coats for sale in the autumn.

loans.use: to purchase women's seasonal clothing, specifically jackets, blazers and coats for sale in the autumn

loans.name: Mayra Alexandra

texts.es: Mayra Alexandra de veintiuno años de edad vive junto a sus padres, ella es empleada, trabaja como cajera y además tiene un pequeño negocio de bisutería, el cual atiende su madre, con eso logra el sustento diario; Mayra Alexandra es una mujer muy capaz, emprendedora y con muchas ganas de salir adelante, su vivienda está un poco deteriorada y necesita reconstruir el muro de la parte de atrás de la casa pero no posee el capital para costear los gastos de materiales, por eso se decidió a solicitarle a FUSAI un crédito que le permita comprar ladrillos, cemento, arena, grava, hierro. Mayra Alexandra está muy contenta con la ayuda y asegura cancelar los pagos correspondientes.
texts.en:
Mayra Alexandra, 21, lives with her parents.  She works as a cashier and also has a small costume jewelry business that she looks after with her mother.  This is how she supports herself on a daily basis.

Mayra Alexandra is a very capable and enterprising woman who very much wants to get ahead.  Her house is a little worn and she needs to rebuild the wall behind the house.  She doesn't have the capital to pay for the materials, though, so she decided to ask FUSAI for a loan to buy bricks, cement, sand, gravel, and rebar.

Mayra Alexandra is very happy with the help and guarantees that she'll make the payments.

loans.use: to buy construction supplies

loans.name: Gloria

texts.en: Gloria is a 54-year-old widow and has four adult children. She lives in Birayan Rizal Zamboanga del Norte. She has been engaged in the hog fattening business for two years and earns 3000 PHP a month. She requested a new loan to purchase feed and piglets. Gloria has been a CUMI member of Paglaum MPC for four years and is satisfied with the products and services being offered to her.

loans.use: to buy hog feed

loans.name: Alfonso

texts.es: Don Alfonso, tiene 59 años de edad, es casado, tiene dos hijos y vive en Siguatepeque, Comayagua.  Toda su vida la ha dedicado a la agricultura, lleva 16 años de dedicarse a cultivar café. La producción que saca la vende en el mercado local en pergamino y en uva. Ha obtenido varios prestamos con la institución para poder mantener sus cultivos. Actualmente ha solicitado otro por 10,000 lempiras con el cual va sembrar plantas de café y cubrirá los gastos de insumos y mano de obra. La meta propuesta es sembrar 1 1/2 manzana de café para incrementar los ingresos familiares.
texts.en: Alfonso, 59, is married, has two children, and lives in Siguatepeque, Comayagua. He has farmed all his life, and he has been growing coffee for 16 years. He sells his production, parchment coffee and coffee cherries, in the local market. He has had several loans with the institution to maintain his crops. He has now applied for a loan of 10,000 lempiras to plant coffee and to pay for supplies and labor.  His goal is to plant 1 1/2 manzanas of coffee to increase his family's income.

loans.use: to plant coffee and to pay for supplies and labor.

loans.name: Letty

texts.en: Letty is 41 years old. She is married without children. She lives in Mabini Baliangao Misamis Occidental. Letty engages in the coco farming business and her husband is a fisherman. They earn a monthly income of 5000 PHP. Letty has been a CUMI member of Paglaum MPC for 8 years. She requested a new loan to be used to purchase construction materials needed for home repair. She hopes to save more.

loans.use: to purchase materials for house renovation

loans.name: Firuza

texts.ru:
Фирузе 40 лет. Она живет в районе Рудаки с мужем, двумя сыновьями и дочерью. Чтобы обеспечивать семью ее муж и старший сын уехали на заработки в Россию. Ее второй сын является студентом, а дочь еще учится в школе. 
Фируза рядом с домом построила помещение для ведения нового бизнеса, она решила открыть собственный продуктовый магазин. К сожалению у Фирузы закончились сбережения и ей не хватило средств для внутреннего ремонта помещения и закупа продуктов. Фируза хоть и не опытна в этой сфере, но ее тяга к улучшению жизни своей семьи дают надежду на лучшее. Она берет кредит, и часть денег хочет потратить на покупку стройматериалов, чтобы завершить ремонт. На другую часть кредита она собирается купить продукты питания, в том числе соль, чай, макароны, подсолнечное масло, колбасные изделия, пельмени, детские смеси, шоколад, конфеты, сгущенное молоко, пряники, печенье, салфетки и многое другое. У Фирузы доброе лицо и чистая душа, у такой женщины в жизни все должно быть хорошо. Вы можете ей помочь!
texts.en:
Firuza is 40 years old. She lives in Rudaki with her husband, two sons, and a daughter. To provide for the family, her husband and oldest son went to work in Russia. Her second son is a university student, and her daughter is still in school. 

Firuza is building a shop next to her house to open a new business. She is opening her own grocery store. Unfortunately, Firuza ran out of savings, and she does not have the means to finish the building and purchase inventory. Firuza, though inexperienced in trade, dearly wants to improve her family members' lives and hopes for a better future. She is taking out a loan, and wants to spend some of the money to buy building materials to complete the renovation. The rest of the loan is going to buy food including salt, tea, pasta, sunflower oil, sausages, dumplings, baby formula, chocolate, candy, sweetened condensed milk, cakes, cookies, napkins, and more. Firuza has a kind face and a pure soul. Life should be good for this kind of woman. You can help her!

loans.use: finish building and buy inventory to open a grocery store.

loans.name: Blanca

texts.es:
Blanca, es casada y tiene una hija la cual ya es independiente,vive en casa propia ocupando dos habitaciones con paredes de ladrillo y el piso de tierra, la casa se encuentra en la población de Palomar en el departamento de La Paz.
Actualmente se dedica a la agricultura y producción de verduras y con los pocos ingresos que tiene debe cubrir sus gastos de alimentación y pago de servicios básicos 
Trabaja durante muchas horas en la agricultura ya que su producción es bastante baja debido a que Blanca es de la tercera edad ,es por eso que solicita el crédito para la compra de semilla mejorada ya que le sera de mucha ayuda por que la misma no requiere de tanto riego,el terreno no se desgasta tanto y su producción es mas rápida y mas limpia.
El sueño de Blanca es mejorar sus ingresos y dedicarse al engorde de ganado pero eso requiere de mas ingresos,de esta forma mejorara su calidad de vida. esta sera la tercera vez que su credito va a través de Kiva.
texts.en:
Blanca is married and has an adult daughter. She lives in her own house, which has two rooms, brick walls, and dirt floors and is located in Palomar in La Paz department. She farms and grows vegetables, and she has to pay for food and basic services with the scarce income she earns. She works long hours, but her output is low as Blanca is older. 

She has applied for a loan to buy improved seed, which would be a great help to her because it requires less irrigation, conserves the earth, and grows faster and cleaner. Blanca dreams of earning more and raising cattle to improve her living conditions, but that requires more income. This will be her third loan cycle with Kiva.

loans.use: to buy improved vegetable seeds.

loans.name: Merlyn

texts.en:
Merlyn, age 52, is happy tending her little store.  She is married with eight kids. The store is her means of earning a living to support her family.  Fortunately, her store is located in a populous neighborhood, and so she makes promising daily sales.  Merlyn runs the store well, even though there is increased competition from other stores.   Merlyn believes that with PMPC's support, as a family they will sustain and beat the competition.  

Merlyn has reached her third year being a member to Paglaum MPC.  She has applied for a loan of 20,000 PHP for the store. Expanding her inventory will mean additional income. She has confidence that she can maintain the label of "member in good standing." She is a hardworking mother.  She wishes to sustain the store, and from that income be able to provide a good education for her children.

loans.use: To buy stocks for her sari-sari store (general store)

loans.name: Byron

texts.en:
Byron is an artisan in Guatemala who works in wrought iron using traditional forging techniques. He hopes to purchase raw materials such as iron to increase production.

Byron has been selling through NOVICA since 2010. This is his story:

'I work in wrought iron. All my designs are completely original and crafted by hand. The wrought iron is created with fire and a forge. I never liked school much. All my life, what I've been passionate about is my work, my art. I have two daughters who are the light of my life. Someday when they're grown up and have their own families, I'd like to teach my art to my grandsons."

A message from Byron: "I want to thank all of you good-hearted people who assist individual artisans like myself. The economic situation right now is tough and I want to craft designs for Christmas sales. Thank you very much!"

loans.use: to purchase raw materials such as iron to increase production

loans.name: Procesa

texts.en:
Procesa is 50 years old, married, and a resident of Brgy. Culo, Molave Zamboanga del Sur, Philippines. She earns a living through her sari-sari store. 

She has been a member of PMPC for four years and enjoys the privileges of being a member of the Cooperative. Now, she is applying a loan of 14,900 PHP to buy additional stocks for her sari-sari store.

Procesa deeply wishes to maintain her status as a member in good standing with PMPC.

loans.use: To restock her sari-sari store with basic commodities

loans.name: Juan

texts.en:
Juan is an artisan from Peru who specializes in handcrafted sterling silver jewelry. He would like to invest in the purchase of sterling silver and natural gemstones for production.

Juan has been selling through NOVICA since 2004. This is his story:

"My wife Rosario and I once ran a clothing shop, but financial hardship struck. My wife was eager to design jewelry, and at first we relied on expert silversmiths. I was fascinated with the process and became an eager student – I now design and craft my own jewelry. My style is different than my wife's, and we are both proud to see how far we have come. I'm driven by a desire to excel and I strive to transmit beauty and quality."

A message from Juan: "Thank you so much for this microcredit, because it will make it easier for me to prepare a good stock for the coming holiday season."

loans.use: to invest in the purchase of sterling silver and natural gemstones for production

loans.name: Ikhbol

texts.ru: Ихбол эталон настоящей женщины таджички, женщины дехканки. Имя Ихбол обозначает первая счастливая звезда. Ей 59 лет. Он жена и мать 9 детей. Ихбол помогла четверым сыновьям обзавестись семьями. Троих дочерей выдать замуж. А ее муж и сын работают в Российской Федерации. С ней живет ее 25 летняя дочь, которая работает в больнице медсестрой. Сама Ихбол в течение 10 лет работает бригадиром в дехканском хозяйстве. Она очень трудолюбивая. Во дворе у Ихбол имеется скотный двор, где она держит там своих коров. За животными она ухаживает сама. Зимой Ихбол шьет национальные ватные одеяла и подушки. А сейчас осень и она готовится к осеннему посеву. Ей нужны деньги, чтобы купить семена картофеля, минеральные удобрения и горючую смесь. С этим принадлежностями она собирается обработать землю и посадить осенний урожай. Ихбол собирается посеять картофель и зимнюю пшеницу. Она женщина трудяга, добивающаяся своей цели. Глядя на нее, можно сказать она достойна лучшего.
texts.en:
Ikhbol is an exemplary Tajik woman and farmer. The name "Ikhbol" means "first lucky star". She is 59 years old, married, and has nine children. Ikhbol helped four sons to start families, and three daughters to find husbands. Her husband and son work in the Russian Federation. Ikhbol's 25 year old daughter lives with her and works as a nurse in a hospital. 

Ikhbol herself has been working as a team leader on a farm for over 10 years, and is very hardworking. Ikhbol has a barnyard where she keeps two cows and looks after them herself. In the winter, Ikhbol sews traditional quilts and pillows. At the moment, Ikhbol is preparing for autumn planting. She needs to buy potato seeds, mineral fertilizers, and fuel. With these items, she will be able to treat the soil and plant her fall harvest of potatoes and wheat. Ikhbol is hardworking woman who achieves her goals. Taking all of this into account, we can say she deserves the best.

loans.use: to buy potato seeds, mineral fertilizers, and fuel

loans.name: Sarfiya

texts.ru: Сарфия целеустремленная женщина. Она замужем и на воспитании имеет 2 детей. Сарфия более 12 лет занимается купле продажей сухофруктов на местном рынке. Сарфия торгует на местном рынке и имеет своих постоянных клиентов. Ее муж помогает ей введению бизнеса. Сарфия с дохода купила холодильник, кровать и шкаф. Она постепенно улучшает условию проживания. Сарфия данное время хочет отремонтировать свой старый дом, который имеет плохое состояние. Сарфия хочет заменить окна и двери, так как окна старые и зимой не держать теплоту внутри дома. Из-за холода у них насморк всегда зимой. Она запрашивает займ на сумму 3000 сомони для покупки окна и дверей. Она ждет вашу доброту и надеется на ваше милосердие.
texts.en: Sarfiya is a single-minded woman. She is married and is raising two children. Sarfiya has more than twelve years of experience buying and selling dried fruit at a local market. Sarfiya trades at the local market and has regular customers. Her husband helps her run her business.  Sarfiya has used income from her business to buy a refrigerator, a bed, and a wardrobe. She is gradually improving her family's living conditions. Sarfiya currently wants to renovate her old house, which is in poor condition. Sarfiya wants to replace the windows and doors, since the windows are old and do not keep the heat in during the winter. Because of the cold in the winter, they constantly have runny noses. She is asking for a loan of 3,000 KGS to buy windows and doors. She's awaiting your kindness and hoping for your mercy.

loans.use: buy windows and doors for her house

loans.name: Luisa

texts.en:
Luisa creates fashionable apparel and accessories using the cotton grown by her family. She would like to purchase additional materials that complement her natural fabrics.

Luisa has been selling through NOVICA since 2010. This is her story:

"My story is really the story of my whole family, beginning with my parents. My father was passionate about growing cotton, a crop that originated with the Maya. We work with only three pure colors. Apart from the crude hue, we use a seed known as 'ixcaco' for the brown cotton. We call our third color jade. All the rest of our colors are a result of combining these three when weaving the fabric."

"I appreciate the opportunity this microcredit provides, as it will let us invest in materials to create new designs and increase the styles we can offer. This will benefit the women of 30 communities who work with us and make it possible for more of them to earn a living."

loans.use: to invest in new raw materials and expand variety of product designs

loans.name: Susan

texts.en:
Susan is married with 2 children. Susan is 54 years old and lives in Libertad Bajo, Sinacaban, Philippines.

Susan sells load (phone minutes) to earn a living and has had this business for 1 year. Each month, she earns PHP 2000 doing this type of work. She has requested a loan for 6000 to pay for additional load wallet intended for retailing business.

Susan has been a member of PMPC for 2 years.  In the future, Susan hope to financially support her immediate family members.

loans.use: to pay for additional load wallet to sell

loans.name: Tatyana

texts.ru:
Татьяна в разводе, воспитывает дочь 20 лет. Она живет в Белой Церкви. Торгует на центральном рынке города мужской обувью уже 16 лет. В товаре у нее 70 000 гривен. Средняя месячная прибыль составляет 6 700 гривен. 
Татьяне необходима сумма в 20 000 гривен для того, чтобы приобрести зимнюю обувь для торговли в преддверии холодного и снежного зимнего сезона. За счет увеличения дохода за счет полученных от КИВА средств Татьяна сможет заработать деньги для улучшения благосостояния своей семьи.
texts.en:
Tatyana is divorced, has a 20-year-old daughter, and lives in Belaya Tserkov, Ukraine. She has been selling women's shoes at the central market for over 16 years, and has over 70,000 UAH worth of products. Her average monthly income is 6,700 UAH.

Tatyana needs 20,000 UAH in order to buy winter footwear to sell in anticipation of a cold and snowy winter season. With the increased revenue resulting from Kiva's assistance, Tatyana will be able to improve the well-being of her family.

loans.use: to purchase winter footwear

loans.name: Gulom

texts.ru: Гулому 52 года. Он прекрасный семьянин, проживает в городе Худжанд с женой, дочерью и сыном. Гулом работает водителем микроавтобуса, а его жена работает швеей. Сын Гулома очень хочет научиться снимать сюжеты и он уже выбрал профессию, которым раньше занимался его отец, он хочет быть оператором. Он просит отца, чтобы он работал вместе с ним и научил его этой профессии. У Гулома 10 летний опыт в этой сфере. Он раньше работал оператором, снимал национальные праздники и торжественные мероприятия. Он научился этой профессии еще в юности у дяди. Гулом запрашивает кредит, чтобы купить видеокамеру. Он бросает работу водителя и планирует вернуться к профессии оператора, чтобы научить  сына. Гулом будет получать заказы и брать собой сына, они вместе будут заниматься этим бизнесом.
texts.en: Gulom is 52. He's a wonderful family man who lives in the city of Khujand with his wife, daughter, and son. Gulom drives a minivan, and his wife works as a seamstress. Gulom's son really wants to learn videography. He has chosen this profession which used to be his father's. He wants to be a videographer. He has asked his father to work with him and teach him the business. Gulom has ten years of experience in this field. He previously worked as a videographer and filmed national holidays and celebrations. He learned the profession at an early age from his uncle. Gulom is asking for a loan to buy a video camera. He is quitting driving and plans to return to videography to teach his son. Gulom will take jobs and do them with his son, so they will do the work together.

loans.use: buy a video camera.

loans.name: Evelyn Yanet

texts.es: Evelyn Yanet de treinta y cinco años de edad vive junto a su compañero de vida y su hijo en casa propia. Ella se dedica a la venta de lácteos, trabaja todos los días desde su vivienda, además su esposo es motorista y aporta para completar los gastos del hogar; Evelyn Yanet es una mujer activa, audaz y muy responsable, desea lo mejor para su familia por eso quiere  realizar en su vivienda algunas reparaciones, necesita cambiar el techo de toda la casa y el baño, ya que está muy deteriorado y se filtra el agua, quiere empezar el trabajo lo más rápido posible porque le preocupa la época de lluvia además; no posee de capital que respalde el gasto de materiales por eso le solicita a FUSAI un crédito que le permita comprar lamina galvanizada, polines, cemento. Evelyn Yanet está muy agradecida y asegura que saldara la deuda correspondiente.
texts.en: Evelyn Yanet is 35 years old and lives with her life’s partner and her son in a house that she owns.  She sells dairy products and works out of her home every day.  Her husband drives a motorcycle in order to contribute to the household expenses.   Evelyn Yanet is an active, very responsible woman with lots of initiative.  She wants the best for her family, so she wants to make some repairs to her home, such as replacing the roof throughout the house and the bathroom, because the current one is very deteriorated and it leaks.  She wants to begin the work as soon as possible because she is worried about the rainy season.  She doesn’t have enough capital to pay for the work, so she is asking for a loan through FUSAI so she can buy galvanized metal, girders, and cement.  Evelyn Yanet is very grateful and assures us that she will repay this debt.

loans.use: to buy roofing materials.

loans.name: Wijayana

texts.en:
Wijayana crafts beautiful Balinese jewelry with silver and gemstones. He hopes to develop new designs and make improvements to his workshop.

Wijayana has been selling through NOVICA since 2012. This is his story:

"When I was 10 years old, my parents told me to learn about silver jewelry because someday, when I got older, I'd be able to make a living from this skill. They taught me everything. The way they love their work made me love this world of jewelry. The nicest part of my jewelry is the uniqueness of its style. I'm hoping to receive the microcredit because it will help me a lot to continue creating my jewelry and develop new designs. I also want to expand my workshop so we can work more comfortably. There is nothing I can say but thank you so much for your funding and support."

loans.use: to develop new jewelry designs and make improvements to his workshop

loans.name: Diah

texts.en:
Diah is a Balinese artisan who specializes in handcrafted sterling silver jewelry. She would like to invest in the purchase of silver to prepare a stock for the holiday season.

Diah has been selling through NOVICA since 2006. This is her story:

"I'm from Jogja, in Central Java. I started to work seriously with silver the first year I lived in Bali, around 1995. The unique culture, charm, and beauty of this paradise island have become my never-ending source of inspiration. My main jewelry themes are flowers, animals, stars, the moon, sun, cultural symbols and other ornamentations. There are four people from my village who help me craft my designs. Designing and my family are my priorities in life. My family – especially my husband – gave their best support to what I've been doing and I am really thankful for having them in my life."

A message from Diah: "I would like to express my gratitude to all of you for this microcredit. With your support I'll be able to craft more products which I hope you'll be able to see and like. Your microcredit made it possible! Thank you."

loans.use: to invest in the purchase of silver to prepare a stock for the holiday season

loans.name: Marcelina

texts.en:
Marcelina is married with 5 children. Marcelina is 70 years old and lives in Maikay,Tudela, Philippines. Marcelina is a farmer and grows fruit and vegetable crops to earn a living. She has been doing this for 10 years. She has requested a loan to buy additional fertilizers and other gardening tools including spade, garden fork, shovels, rakes, pruners, etc.
Marcelina has been a member of PMPC for 8 years. In the future, Marcelina hopes to save for future emergencies.

loans.use: to buy additional fertilizers and other gardening tools including spade, garden fork, shovels, rakes, pruners, etc.

loans.name: Rendah

texts.en:
Rendah is an artisan from Bali who specializes in hand-carved sculptures. He would like to invest in a bulk purchase of raw wood.

Rendah has been selling through NOVICA since 2000. This is his story:

Rendah's father began teaching him to sculpt when he was a young boy. "Balinese woodcarving touches me very deeply. I have learned a variety of arts in Bali, such as gamelan dance, but carving a piece of wood gives me an incomparable sensation. After I finished school, I studied further because I needed more experience, and the tools and materials I needed were beyond my financial reach. Exploring the abstract world refreshes my mind in creating new carvings."

"Thank you, thank you, thank you! Your support through this microcredit means a lot to me because I can increase my work. I hope you'll like my sculptures, too."

loans.use: to invest in a bulk purchase of raw wood for his carvings

loans.name: Loreta

texts.en:
Loreta is a 54-year-old, single member of Paglaum Multi Purpose Cooperative from Lawis, Sindangan, Zamboanga del Norte industriously caring for her fishing activities. She personally takes charge of their business, and her niece and nephew work for them as support. The business is doing well.  Loreta has humbly taught her relatives the techniques of how to enjoy business and at the same time make earnings from it. The ups and downs of the business is nothing but a normal situation for her. Sometimes she has business losses, sometimes a good return. She is a savvy business woman. 

Now Loreta sees a good opportunity to expand her business. She is requesting PHP 7,000 from Paglaum Multi Purpose Cooperative as her additional capital of her business. She deeply wishes to have a successful business venture.

loans.use: to buy fish

loans.name: Venedora

texts.en:
A $1.000.00 loan is offered to Venedora to improve her business. She is married and she has one children She is opened her kiosk in 2008 with her own working. She will use the loan to buy stocks to keep in her store like body loosen, noodles, cigarettes, salt, sugar, coffee, oil and fanta. She is generating a good income from selling.

She has been thinking of running a big business after years of involving herself in doing business. She is living in a town with her family.

loans.use: To buy body loosen, noodles, cigarettes, salt, sugar, coffee, oil and fanta

loans.name: Blandina

texts.en:
A $600.00 is offered to Blandina to improve her business. She has a kiosk where many people come to buy every day. She will buy some additional supplies such as oil, salt, noodles, coffee, sugar, cigarettes, slippers and pans. She has been involving herself in business activities since 2002. She feels so comfortable to run her business because she can earn money every day.

Running a business has made Blandina independent because she can be responsible for herself and also helping her family. She hopes to run a bigger business in the future.

loans.use: To buy oil, salt, noodles, coffee, sugar, cigarettes, slippers and pans

loans.name: Olinda

texts.en:
A $1,000 loan is offered to Olinda to improve her business. She opened her kiosk in 2000 with her own working capital of $100. She will use the loan to buy stock to keep in her store like noodles, coffee, sugar, salt, cigarettes and slippers. Olinda is generating a good income from selling her things from the kiosk.

She has been thinking of running a big business after years of involving herself in doing business and she is living in a town with her family.

loans.use: To buy noodles, coffee, sugar, salt, cigarettes and slippers

loans.name: Julio Alfonso

texts.es: Don julio, tiene 64 años de edad, es soltero, vive con un hijo menor en el municipio de San Pedro Sula. Siempre se ha dedicado al comercio, lleva 10 años de dedicarse a vende materiales para reciclar. El compra periódicos viejos, papel, cartones, plásticos y los vende en las fábricas de reciclaje. Ha mantenido esta actividad mediante la inversión de préstamos, actualmente  ha solicitado el cuarto ciclo que es por 9,000 Lempiras con el cual va comprar mas materiales y revenderlos, también va comprar repuestos para reparar su motocicleta. El propósito de generar mas ingresos y mantener el negocio para mejorar la calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Julio, 64, is single and lives with his youngest son in the city of San Pedro Sula. He has always been a merchant, and, for the past 10 years, he has sold recycled materials. He buys newspaper, paper, cardboard and plastics to sell to recycling plants. 

He has taken out loans to sustain his business. He is in his fourth loan cycle and has applied for a loan of 9,000 lempiras to buy materials to recycle and sell, to buy spare parts, and to repair his motorcycle. His goal is to earn more, sustain his business, and improve his standard of living.

loans.use: to buy materials to recycle and sell, to buy spare parts, and to repair his motorcycle.

loans.name: Larisa

texts.ru:
Лариса – из Новой Каховки. Она разведена, дети у нее уже взрослые. Она занимается торговлей на одном из местных крытых рынков, арендуя землю у администрации. Лариса торгует клееночной продукцией, москитными сетками, скатертями, салфетками. Занимается этим бизнесом уже 17 лет, имеет достаточный опыт торговли и ходовой товар. 
Лариса планирует вложить кредит в 22 000 гривен для того, чтобы поехать в запланированную поездку и закупить клееночную продукцию, скатерти и салфетки.
texts.en: Larisa lives in Novaya Kahovka, is divorced, and has adult children. She sells at one of the local indoor markets, renting a space from the administration. Larisa sells vinyl products, mosquito nets, tablecloths, and napkins. She has been in business for 17 years, and has enough experience and top-selling products. Larisa plans to invest the loan amount of 22,000 UAH in her scheduled trip to buy vinyl products, tablecloths and napkins.

loans.use: to purchase plastic tablecloths, mosquito nets and napkins wholesale

loans.name: Shiiter

texts.en:
Mrs. Shiiter, 53 years old, lives with her son in Darkhan, the second largest city of Mongolia. She has been working as a saleswoman at a grocery store for ten years. Her son is a truck driver and works at a mining company. 

She is requesting a loan of 4,000,000 MNT to purchase building and insulation materials, such as planks, cement, fiberglass and foam. Using those materials, she and her son will repair and insulate their old house. The renovated house will enable the family to burn less coal for heating, thus releasing fewer pollutants into the atmosphere. 

The borrower is a very hardworking individual who strives for a better future.

loans.use: to purchase building and insulation materials.

loans.name: Antonia

texts.en:
Antonia applying for a loan of $1000.00 to improve her business and this is her first loan. She will use the loan to buy some additional supplies to keep in her store such as coffee, cigarettes, salt, body loosen, milk, fanta, coca cola, sprite, fish and biscuits.

Antonia opened her kiosk in 2010 with her own working capital of $200.00. She is earning a good income and she will use the income to support her family and improve their living conditions.

loans.use: To buy coffee, cigarettes, salt, body loosen, milk, fanta, coca cola, sprite, fish and biscuits.

loans.name: Sadurdin

texts.ru: Садурдин истинный скотовод. Хотя ему 59 лет, он не считает себя старым и способен работать и дальше. Он около 15 лет занимается разведением крупного рогатого скота и не намерен останавливаться на достигнутом. Садурдин сейчас хочет увеличить поголовье коров в своем скотном дворе и с такой целью берет повторный кредит для закупа нового скота. Мы желаем ему успеха в достижениях!
texts.en: Sadurdin is a true herdsman. Though he is 59 years old, he does not consider himself to be old, and he is capable of work for a long time yet. He has been raising cattle for nearly fifteen years and does not intend to stop now. Sadurdin wants to increase the number of cows in his barnyard, and with that in mind, he is taking out a second loan to buy new cattle. We wish him success in all of his achievements!

loans.use: buy cattle to increase his herd.

loans.name: Evelyn

texts.en: Evelyn runs a general store in the village of San Pedro Polanco in Zamboanga del Norte while her husband works as an OFW to make a living. For more than four years in this business, she has always found ways to expand and improve it in order to support the needs of her two children and to give them a nice future. She joined GDMPC to gain access to microfinance services. Recently, she borrowed a loan of 5,000 PHP to purchase raw ingredients for the cafeteria, her extension business with her general store. She wants to improve her cafeteria services and expand her business to have a better living situation in the near future.

loans.use: to purchase raw ingredients

location.town: San Pedro Polanco, Zamboanga del Norte

loans.name: Lilian Beralia

texts.es: Lilian, tiene 45 años de edad, es madre soltera, tiene un hijo y vive en el municipio de Tela, Atlántida junto a su hijo y su madre. Ella trabajo varios años en una empresa privada y luego de quedar sin empleo decidió establecer su propio negocio de venta de golosinas como churros, galletas, dulces etc. Esta actividad la realiza desde hace 1 año y le va bien. Ha solicitado un préstamo por 4,000 lempiras para surtir de productos como refrescos, churros, dulces y galletas para aumentar las ventas y hacer crecer el negocio. Su meta es mejorar su calidad de vida teniendo una fuente de ingresos mayor, con la idea de llegar a tener una pulpería fuerte, para poder establecerle un taller a su hijo.
texts.en:
Lilian, 45, is a single mother, has a son, and lives in Tela, Atlántida with her child and mother. She worked for years at a private company. After becoming unemployed, she decided to start her own business selling sweets like churros, cookies, and candy. The business is now a year old, and it is prospering. 

She has applied for a loan of 4,000 lempiras to buy items like beverages, churros, candy, and cookies to increase sales and grow her business. Her goal is to improve her standard of living through higher income. She wants to eventually open a bigger grocery store and be able to set up a workshop for her son.

loans.use: to buy beverages and candies to stock her business.

loans.name: Maria

texts.en:
Maria is taking a loan of USD 600 to improve her business. She is running a kiosk that helps her to generate income for her family. 

She will use the loan to buy stocks to keep in her store, such as slippers, cigarettes, coffee, sugar, fish, and body lotion. 

Maria opened her kiosk a year ago with her own working capital of USD 200. She is a hard-working woman and she hopes to run a bigger business in the future.

loans.use: To buy slippers, cigarettes, coffee, sugar, fish, and body lotion to sell.

loans.name: Ashirkhon

texts.ru: Аширхон 57-летняя вдова. У нее трое дочерей и трое сыновей. Ее старшие дети уже обзаведены семьями. Аширхон проживает в районе Яван с двумя сыновьями, двумя дочерьми, невесткой и внуками. Она имеет свой торговый бизнес. Аширхон в течение 25 лет занимается продажей конфет и сухофруктов. Она с детства любила торговать и поэтому выбрала такую профессию. Она берет кредит, чтобы закупить ассортимент конфет и сухофруктов для развития бизнеса. Аширхон обычно оптом закупает товар с города Душанбе, затем приводит в свой родной район Яван и продает его в своей торговой точке на центральном рынке. Аширхон приятная и интересная женщина. Общение с ней это уже праздник.
texts.en: Ashirhkon is a 57-year-old widow. She has three daughters and three sons. Her older children already have families of their own.  Ashirkhon lives in Yavan with her two sons, two daughters, daughter-in-law and grandchildren. She has her own business in trade. Ashirkhon has sold candy and dried fruit for twenty-five years. Since she was a child she loved working in sales, so she chose this profession. She is taking out a loan to purchase a variety of candies and dried fruit to expand her business. Ashirkhon usually buys goods in bulk in Dushanbe, then delivers it to her home town of Yavan where she sells it retail in the central market. Ashirkhon is a nice and interesting woman. Simply chatting with her is a great time.

loans.use: buy candy and dried fruit.

loans.name: Jesús

texts.es: Jesús se dedica a la venta de mariscos, tiene una pescadería y la abastece por medio de algunos pescadores a quienes les compra el producto para venderlo en su negocio, siendo está la época más alta en cuanto a pesca se refiere solicita un millón de colones  (¢1.000.000) para adquirir más producto (mariscos) y surtir mejor su negocio, y a la vez brindarle un mejor serviico a su clientela.
texts.en:
Jesús makes his living selling seafood.  He has a fish market, and he stocks it through some fishermen from whom he buys fish to sell in his business.

Since this is the highest season for fishing, he is applying for one million colones (¢1,000,000) to buy more seafood and better stock his business, and also to provide better service to his customers.

loans.use: to buy seafood.

loans.name: Evelyn

texts.en:
Evelyn is 51 years old, married and a resident of Maular, Aloran, Misamis Occidental. She is a business woman who sells a variety of merchandise. She earns a living through buying and selling products.

Now, she is applying for a loan of PHP 8,000 (Philippine pesos) to restock her buy-and-sell business.

Evelyn deeply wishes to maintain her status as a member in good standing with PMPC.

loans.use: to restock her inventory for her buy-and-sell business.

loans.name: Sokha

texts.en:
Sokha (in the photo) is single, age 25, and lives with his widower father on an island in the Mekong River about fifteen kilometers from Phnom Penh City. He is in the medical university in Phnom Penh. His father is a retired teacher and also buys and sells silk fabric.

Sokha hopes strongly to continue his study, hence he asks for a loan to pay for his school fees.

loans.use: To pay for school fees.

loans.name: Amarjargal

texts.en:
Mrs. Amarjargal, 35 years old, lives with her children in Ulaanbaatar, capital city of Mongolia. Her husband works in Korea on an employment contract, and transfers money each month in order to help his family's life. She has been selling casual clothes by renting a stall at a market since 2010. Their children go to high school. 

She is requesting a loan of 8,000,000 MNT to purchase vacuum insulated windows, hardwood floors, fiberglass, shingles and foam in order to renovate her old house in preparation for the incoming winter. By doing so, her family will live in a comfortable and warm place where they will burn less coal for heating, and release less pollutants into atmosphere. 

According to the state research, the burning of coal is the main source of air pollution in Mongolia.

loans.use: to purchase vacuum insulated windows, hardwood floors, fiberglass, shingles and foam to renovate her old house before the winter.

loans.name: Bope

texts.en:
Bope (pictured here) is single, age 18, and lives with her parent in a suburb of Phnom Penh. 

Malin had just finished her baccalaureate, and she wants to continue her bachelor's degree in accounting at the university. Hence, she has decided to apply for a loan to pay her school fees.

The terms to study for a bachelor's degree in Cambodia: There are four years, which are divided into two semesters each year, first and second semester. And students can prefer to pay school fees by the year or by the semester, depending on school or university privacy policy.

loans.use: To pay her school fees.

loans.name: Edith

texts.fr:
Agée de 40 ans, EDITH est mariée et mère de 5 enfants. Elle vit avec son mari et ses  enfants dans la ville  de Koutiala. 
N’ayant pas eu la chance de faire des études, EDITH s’est très vite intéressé aux activités génératrices de revenus depuis plus de 15 ans, notamment l’achat vente de produits alimentaires condiments qui est un produit de première nécessité pour la préparation de nos repas. 
Pour pouvoir combattre les petites ruptures de stocks qu’elle subit, qui la fait perdre la clientèle, elle décida de rejoindre l’institution de microfinance Soro Yiriwaso pour la bonne satisfaction de sa clientèle. Elle est à son 4ème prêt dont les précédents ont été bien remboursés. Elle compte acheter différents sortes de produits alimentaires avec ce prêt. Elle s’approvisionne à Koutiala et effectue sa vente à son domicile et au kiosque.  Elle espère réaliser un bénéfice mensuel de 50.000FCFA, qu’elle envisage  utiliser  pour payer les  intérêts du prêt de Soro, participer aux dépenses familiales et investir le reste dans son activité.
texts.en:
Edith is 40 years old and married with five children. She lives in the town of Koutiala with her husband and her children.
Not being lucky enough to have studied, 15 years ago Edith very quickly became interested in income generating activities, in particular the sale of food condiments which are important products for the preparation of our meals.
To find a solution for the small episodes of stock shortage that she is subject to and which cause her to lose clients, she decided to join the Soro Yiriwaso micro finance institution. This is her fourth loan and the previous loans were repaid correctly. She plans to buy different sorts of food products with this loan. She buys her stock at Koutiala and sells her products from home and from her stall.
